version_description:
- Resolved bugs and issues
- HDA / Dragon Air
- Added notifications feed
- Added background roster download (if airline support this)
- Added support center and FAQ
- Added Report incorrect event when at event details
- Flight Details, improved action buttons, additional info and crew display
- METAR / TAF available offline

- Bugfixes
- Profile: What's next
- Private Chat (One to One)
- HDA: fix new crew portal
- iPad: Event list lock resolved.
- Profile: Users Nearby Destination
- Statistics: Improved
- Added: Your Roster Downloads (menu More)
- Tap New Roster Notification to open original AIMS or CWP PDF roster

- Bugfixes
Fix for Add Friend
Fix for Chats Direct Closing App

- Fixes and improvements
- For All Airports You can now check Users Nearby
- Chats: delete with all messages
- Chats: performance improved
- Notifications: Improved read/ unread
- Events: Hotel event improved
- Share your Flight or Roster via Linkedin

- Fixes

- Chats became a free feature!

- Fixes

- Fixes

With RosterBuster airline crew can quickly join conversations and get the information they need without the need of exchanging phone numbers or creating WhatsApp groups over and over again. At this moment RosterBuster already holds the largest aviation community worldwide, so finding your co-workers will be easy.

Contains updates to the Apple Watch app.
- Added all event types to the Apple Watch app
- Event types can be hidden in the Watch app on your iOS device,
under 'My Watch' > 'RosterBuster'
- Improved performance in the Apple Watch app

Other improvements:
- Fixed an issue with the shared calendar in 'Followers'
- Added a help page in 'Account & Settings' > 'Roster Download' when emailing your roster is supported

- Fixes
- Apple Watch: complication
- Apple Watch: set timezone
- Apple Watch: select duty types
- Improve meetup suggestions
- Manual Roster Download

Don't forget to share via #rosterbuster :)
Each month you can win amazing prizes with sharing your flight map.

Like our update? We would be happy to see your review at the AppStore!

Questions / Suggestions? Write us at support@rosterbuster.com

- Fixes
- Apple Watch Time Display
- Added support for Emirates! Pilots and Cabin Crews

- Fixes
- Improved roster upload steps
- Improved support for UAE Cabin Crew roster

Compatibility with iOS 13
- The app will follow the system theme. This can be adjusted in More > Account & Settings > Display
Fixed issue where automatic roster download intervals were not accessible for Premium users
Fixed an issue where chats were not working while offline

Fixed a bug where the flight stats screen automatically closed
Fixed a couple of crashes

Fixed error during manual roster download for some airlines
Fixed filter button in Statistics not showing

Updated Statistics
Updated Flight Routes
Added Ranking in Statistics
Added Badges in Statistics

Updates
- Improved Friends section under the hood
- Introduced disabling of roster sharing with friends, swipe on a friend in the friends list to use this feature
- Introduced shared flights on the public profile to see flights you have flown or will fly together with another user
- Added personal promo code to the group chat invite link. People following this link will be able to create an account with your promo code and will be added to the group chat automatically
- Improved routes and airports on maps in Statistics and Flight Routes

Apple Watch
- Potential fix for sync issues
- The complication should now show the next event after a layover during this layover

Fixes
- Fixed swipe to go back gesture across the app
- Fixed color issues in several screens in Dark mode
- Sharing through Instagram after a successful roster download should now be working
- Routes on the map in Statistics should now be cleared when there are no statistics available for the selected period
- Fixed loading issues in Statistics
- Fixed some crashes

Simplified list of crew in flight details
- It will now show a list of the crew on the roster
- If one of those crew members has a RosterBuster account, you can open their profile
- For crew members without a RosterBuster account an icon is shown
- By default the text from the roster is shown
- When a list of crew members is shown the text from the roster can be seen by tapping the icon next to "CREW MEMBERS"

Tailnumber of a flight is now shown next to the flightnumber in both the flight details and events list, when available.

Fixed loading and upload issues in UAE portal
Fixed privacy settings not saving correctly
Fixed broken layout in Statistics
Fixed white 'flickering' on rows in dark mode
Fixed dark mode for Badges screen
Fixed crashes in Public Profile
Fixed crash in Ranking

Friends&Family
- The functionality of the Friends&Family app is now fully integrated into RosterBuster.
- Existing Friends&Family users can use their account to sign in.
- New Friends&Family accounts can also be created.

Roster Download
- Improved roster download flow for airlines using the automatic roster download.
- The new approach is faster and (hopefully) less error prone

Device Calendar Export
- Added the ability to select a calendar to export to.
- This calendar can also be in an iCloud, Google or other account.

Added flight details for flights on another user's profile.

Added check before syncing events to see if it's really necessary. This reduces data usage and server load.

Fixed a crash in the flight screen
Fixed a crash in public profile
Fixed various layout issues

- Fixed homebase selection not showing when no homebase is selected
- Local calendar selection now shows the currently selected calendar
- Disabled 'Show All' button in calendar selection
- Fixed a crash in Profile, during flight stats loading
- Disabled Spotlight indexing due to instability

Improved flight status updates
- The tailnumber/callsign is now more readily available
- Gate & Terminal information should also be more readily available

Added an option to quickly acknowledge changes
- During a roster download, an alert will appear when changes need to be acknowledged in the crew portal
- Follow the link to open the crew portal, acknowledge the changes and return to try another download when done

Added blocking of users in private conversations
- Use the top-left menu in a private conversation to block the other user from sending you private messages
- To unblock a user, go to their profile and start a new conversation from there

Added Friends&Family Invite
- Go to More > Followers to create an invite link for the Friends&Family app
- People using this link to sign up to RosterBuster will get a Friends&Family account and are automatically added as your friend

Improved flight sharing
- When sharing flights a fancy new map is generated
- LogTen export (previously included in share) has been moved to the top right menu in the flight screen

Added sharing of Statistics
- Use the share button in Statistics to share the current month
- Currently only sharing of the current month is supported

Added quick option to hide events
- In the detail screen, use the menu to hide events with the same code
- During following roster downloads, these events will no longer be imported
- Hidden roster codes can be found in More > Account & Settings > Roster Download > Roster Codes

Added option to message crew on a layover or hotel events
- This will create a group chat for the flights paired with this layover

Other
- Moved Fridge PDF to More > Followers, with improvements
- Added "(Today)" to dates which are Today
- Events will now always be updated when manually syncing from More > Account & Settings > Website Sync
- Added support for pasting roster text in the app for some airlines
- Improved sharing through Instagram

Fixes
- Fixed timezone selection issue in public profile
- Fixed layover duration format for events in public profile
- Fixed spell check when typing messages
- Fixed some options in Roster Download settings
- Fixed some issues when signing up to RosterBuster
- Fixed manual calendar export sometimes exporting outdated data
- Fixed calendar name not being adjustable
Stability improvements and bug fixes

We've changed the way we integrate translations in the app, which will allow us to keep them more up-to-date. This does however mean that the German, Spanish and Turkish translations are temporarily unavailable while we get them up to par with the English texts.

Added a Duty & Block Hours screen
- This shows all events and their duration used for the calculation of the duty and block hours for the given period.
- To access this screen: Open Statistics > Select a period using the tabs or the custom period selector in the top left > Tap the Duty or Block Hours block
- Tap the Duty or Block Hours block in the screen to switch between them

Added a rolling graph of Duty & Block hours
- This displays the hours from 14 days in the past to 14 days in the future
- Access this screen by tapping the graph icon in the Duty & Block hours screen

Improved reporting of incorrect events
- More event details are now attached to these tickets which should allow us to find and fix issues better

Added support for the large complication on the Infograph Modular watch face

Fixed Apple watch app event display issues
Fixed watch Complications not transitioning correctly
Fixed rotation issue in Export on iPad
Fixed issues with flights opened from a public profile
Fixed chat notifications not opening correctly

Fixed a crash in Crew Portal
Fixed a crash in Day off & Standby event screens
Fixed a crash in Chat list & Chat
Fixed a crash in Airport detail

Added a label in duty & block hours to display the exact date range
Fixed 'Copy to RosterBuster' on PDFs not showing in some instances
Fixed roster source error message in Home
Fixed sharing of Fridge PDF
Fixed tabs being hidden on the public profile
Fixed inaccurate locations for flight routes
Fixed events on public profile only being saved for the last viewed friend
Fixed crash in public profile events
Fixed a crash when deleting an event
Fixed a crash in flight detail

Fixed empty page after finishing exporting to third-party apps
Fixed exporting to third-party apps on iOS 10.3
Fixed a crash in dayoff/standby detail
Fixed a crash when sharing a promocode to crew in flight detail on iPad
Stability improvements and bug fixes

Manage events while offline, get notified about upcoming events when arriving at your base and many small improvements and bug fixes

Manage events while offline
- Create, edit and delete events while offline
- Some improvements to edit event validation

Implemented Dutch translation
Crew on a flight is now ordered based on position
Enlarge avatar on public profiles
Improved bottom tab bar
Added text for Friends & Family invitation in Followers

Fixed roster change notification when events changed after background roster update
Fixed loading of statistics while offline
Fixed scrolling to today's events
Fixed navigation when opening the app through a deeplink
Fixed credentials not always being stored properly during roster download
Fixes an issue where everyone who tried to start a chat was added to the same chat, which displayed all messages in the encoded format.

Added a new tabbed navigation UI in Crew to make the different pages more accessible
Made the warning that all events will be deleted from a calendar that's used for exporting more explicit

Fixed roster source not being available while offline
Fixed events and crew information not being displayed correctly on web cal
Fixed tapping the routes, airports, etc. cells does not work on profile screen
Replaced the follow us option for Google+ with LinkedIn
Fixed UI issues for METAR, TAF and NOTAM data in Airport detail
Fixed refreshing of old events
Fixed incorrect deeplink redirections

Renamed Conversations to Chats
Improved reloading of chats in Chats page
Event subject changed according to event type
Color for temperatures less then 15C on statistics changed to holo blue light
Only save airline, homebase and jobtyp selection when tapping 'Done'

Fixed saving credentials in crew portal
Fixed various display issues
Fixed setting of visibility for Profile and Nearby
Fixed Message Crew not working
Fixed avatar not updating correctly
Fixed validation of event end IATA
Fixed texts for 'Hide these events'
Fixed avatar not showing correctly in chat screen
Fixed a bug causing airline portals to not display all components
Fixed some bugs for notifications on the Home page
Fixed some issues with deeplinks in the new Crew page
Fixed icon issue for offline events
Fixed chat back button sometimes being hidden/not working
Fixed display of raw roster source
Fixed crashes in user search and flight detail

Fixed error during manual roster download for some airlines
Fixed filter button in Statistics not showing

Contains various improvements and fixes:
- Fixed roster source not being formatted properly
- Fixed inconsistent display of event titles in events, duty/block hours and public profile
- Fixed issues with saving credentials for the crew portal
- Fixed display of ICS instructions

Fixed a bug where the flight stats screen automatically closed
Fixed a couple of crashes

Implemented new app theme
- New app icon
- New splash screen
- Improved app theme

Chat Improvements
- Create groups
- Join group chats with QR code
- Change group name and avatar
- Easily add participants from friends
- Added video, file & url sharing
- Added ability to delete messages

Duty, Limits and Pay
- Enter flight and duty rate
- View earnings over a period in duty/block hours screens in Statistics
- Set flight time limits based on FAR 117 or EASA rules
- View set flight time limit in rolling block hours

Watch App
- Implemented new theme
- Fixed event icons

Other
- Added tabs in flight details for flight and crew info
- Allow ICS export for freemium users
- Fixed past events not being shown
- Fixed issues with saving an event when online
- Fixed some crashes

Compatibility with iOS 13
- The app will follow the system theme. This can be adjusted in More > Account & Settings > Display
Fixed issue where automatic roster download intervals were not accessible for Premium users
Fixed an issue where chats were not working while offline

Improvements to events sync on Apple Watch app
Improvements to loading hotel data
Fixed blurry app icon shortcut icons on iOS 13
Fixed an issue where
Fixed various UI issues
Fixed an issue where chat messages could not be decrypted when they were sent while offline
Fixed some memory issues
Fixed some crashes

We've made some improvements to our new theme to improve readability, especially for event times, based on your feedback.

Fixed an issue where the avatar was rotated after upload
Fixed issues with message input when sharing a PDF
Fixed an issue where background roster download incorrectly showed as 'not set up'
Fixed UI issues when loading crew info for a flight
Fixed an issue where the home widget did not always show the correct flights
Fixed an issue where flight time limits were not showing in the block & duty hours graph

Fixed an issue in the watch app where the number of events did not update when changing the setting.
Bug fixes and UI improvements

Added the ability to delete multiple events at once. In the events list, select the top-right button to get started.
Improved syncing of events in the iOS and watch app when adding/changing/deleting events or rosters from another platform (i.e. web)

Fixed an issue where ads could be shown for premium accounts in rare cases
Fixed an issue where rostered crew for a flight was not loaded properly
Fixed latest roster source showing in an incorrect format
FIxed an issue where airports were not loaded correctly
Fixed an issue where the homebase could not be set
Fixed an issue where layover meetups were not loading in some cases
Fixed UI issues in Meetups
Fixed an issue in Home where upcoming flights were not loaded properly
Fixed an issue where shared flights were not showing on a public profile
Fixed an issue where events were not loaded in the watch app
Fixed an issue where the timezone for events on the public profile was not updating

Fixed some crashes
Fixed a crash on Apple watch

Major improvements to the flight, hotel and event detail screens
Improvements to Events Agenda & Month pages
Improvements to Home tab and renamed it to Dashboard
Improvements to Geofence based event notifications
Many UI improvements

Added options in More for the RB Logbook app
Added a facts tab in the airport details
Added India flight time limits

Fixed an issue where a mobile web page could be shown incorrectly in Crew Portal
Fixed an issue where date icons on Month's calendar were not shown correctly
Fixed an issue where some events were not displayed in the Month page
Fixed an issue with displaying KCM details
Fixed an issue where deleting events cause an error
Fixed an issue with the event times selection screen
Fixed issues with chat and notification badge handling
Fixed an issue where some events were shown on the incorrect date
Fixed all day events showing on the incorrect date in local timezone in some cases

- Now you can register with one-tap using your Apple ID.
- Bug fixes on the event page, flight information made more accurate and glitch-free.

Added various filter options in the events agenda list
- Select upcoming for the next few duties
- Select event changes to see any changes with the latest roster upload
- Select flights, layovers, standby, day off and sim to filter on these events

Improved the edit screen for flights & events
- Arrival, departure and airline can now be searched and selected
- Your homebase and airline will automatically be selected when creating a new event
- Added a new UI for selecting event dates/times which allows selecting in zulu, local and device times
- The tailnumber for a flight can now be manually added and edited

Added preferences to select the default events view and filter
- Automatically open on Agenda or Month view
- When opening Agenda, automatically select a specific filter
- Located in More > Account & Settings > Events

Added more options to the RB Logbook export page

Starting a private chat can now be done with any user that has set their profile to public

Improvements to spacing of text in events list

Bug fixes
- Fixed that rosters in image format could not be previewed
- Fixed an error when addding flights
- Fixed an issue where the text input field in a chat was hidden after opening a PDF
- Fixed an issue where the 'save credentials' dialog was shown every time on login to the crew portal
- Fixed some buttons in the airport details screen
- Fixed an issue where statistics were not updated after changing events
- Fixed an issue where manually created events didn't have a title in some cases
- Fixed an issue where double tapping an image while selecting it for a chat would indefinitely show the loading screen
This version includes bugs fixes and performance improvements.

Now you can do lot more with your RosterBuster Apple Watch app.
- Show your Next Duty, Flight Number, and Gate Info directly on the Watch Face.
- Get notifications on your Apple Watch once you are near the airport
- Set your preferred event display timezone in the iPhone, and Apple Watch will reflect the same.

You can connect your RBLogbook account with the RosterBuster with just a tap.
Added support for decimal values for hourly rates.

We've also squashed some bugs and improved the performace to make the app faster.

Thank you for using RosterBuster! In this update, we have some new features for you to enjoy.

- Improved Chats: Now you can join predefined group chats based on your location, homebase or airline.
- Not in the mood for chatting? You can mute your conversations for some time (or longer).
- When receiving a message from an unknown user you'll have the option to immediately add them to your friend's list.
- We've also squashed some bugs and improved the performance to make the app faster.

Stay safe and we hope to see you all flying again soon!

Thank you for using RosterBuster! In this update, we have some new features for you to enjoy.

- Improved Chats: Now you can join predefined group chats based on your location, homebase or airline.
- Not in the mood for chatting? You can mute your conversations for some time (or longer).
- When receiving a message from an unknown user you'll have the option to immediately add them to your friend's list.
- We've also squashed some bugs and improved the performance to make the app faster.

Stay safe and we hope to see you all flying again soon!

Thank you for using RosterBuster! We have done some improvements in this update for you to enjoy.

Improved RB Connect:
- Get important messages from your airline now directly on your Home Screen

COVID-19 information for 100+ airports:
- Check the latest COVID-19 updates for your next flight from the Flight or Airport details

Stay safe and we'll hopefully see you back in the air soon!

Thank you for using RosterBuster! We have done some improvements to this update for you to enjoy.

Roster Download
- Now you can download your roster from the 'Rosters' section in the Events.
- You can also view your recent downloaded rosters as well as delete them.

Export to Calendar
- We've added 'Manage WebCal Calendar' for subscribing, unsubscribing, and resetting your webcal link.
- You can also set all the preferences for calendar export directly from the app.

Export to ThirdParty Apps
- We've added all the export preferences of LogtenPro, SafeLog, and CrewAlert from our portal to the app. Now It's super convenient to export data from the native interface.

App Settings
- Set flight Limits, rate, and other preferences directly from the options menu in the Events.
- Choose how you want to display events, and friends from the Display Settings.

Other Improvements
- Improved date-time selection while adding a manual event.
- Improved event filters: click on any filter and check your next flight, layover, day off, standby, etc.
- Keeping the session alive for some airline when multiple roster uploads are required.

Thank you for your continuous support and feedback. In this version, we listened to your feedback and done the following improvements.

New Features:
- Roster Download is now possible through a native interface. Your crew portal username and password will be filled automatically if you've given the permissions to do so.
- You can view and export your complete history from all the rosters you've uploaded to date.
- Now you can share your flight statistics with social media for any selected time period.
- We've added some useful tips to guide you when your roster download is failed.
- For Qatar airline users we've improved the manual roster download of your PDF roster from tops.

Feedback Improvements:
- Fixed a bug where date selection could not happen in the local timezone while adding or editing events manually.
- Fixed a bug for incorrect flight time duration for the manually edited event.
- Improvement on event list scrolling where users facing an auto-scroll problem after deleting the event.
- Fixed a bug where the red badge not removed from the Home icon after visiting the Notifications screen.
- Fixed a bug where Photos in the conversations can not be opened or shared.
- Added English version of text wherever Dutch translations were missing.

- Improvements in calendar integration.
- Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

Emirates (UAE) and Korean Air (KAL) users now can download the roster from Safari using the below-mentioned steps.
1. Go to Events > Rosters
2. Tap on 'Download Roster’. This will open Safari from the RosterBuster app.
3. Navigate to your roster in Safari.
4. Tap on the Action/Share icon from the bottom menu in Safari.
5. Tap on 'Download Roster’ in the list. We have added this option to download your roster. For future downloads, you can also click on 'Edit Actions...’ (at the bottom), Add ‘Download Roster’, and drag it to the top of the list.
6. Open the 'RosterBuster' app from the top left button in Safari or launch the app.
7. Your roster upload process will start automatically.
8. You can do the same steps in the Safari browser and download your roster without opening the RosterBuster app. Next time when you launch the app, your roster upload process will start automatically.

Other Feedback Improvements:
- For the manual export to the calendar, now you can turn on the 'Export Today Onwards' switch to export future events only.
- We have added a new option to include/exclude aircraft for exporting events to LogTen Pro.
- You can now request to add a new airport if it is not available in our system. You can do so in More > Destinations > Search for the airport > Submit a request by providing the airport details.

We have brought some cool new features for you this Christmas!!

Report/Check-in Reminders
- Now you can set reminders prior to report/check-in in the app.
- Go to Event Settings -> Set Reminder -> Select your time for reminder before the event.
- RosterBuster will automatically update reminders on each roster update.
- Of course, you can turn it off anytime from the same settings screen.

Automatic Calendar/iCloud Calendar Sync
- iCloud calendar sync is now available with a faster sync mechanism.
- Go to Calendar Export -> Select Calendar -> Tap Add Calendar.
- Enter Calendar Name and set Account to iCloud (to sync across iOS devices) -> Tap Done.
- Tap Export to your ’Selected Calendar’. This should sync your RosterBuster events to the calendar.
- Next time when you upload your schedule, RosterBuster will automatically sync events to your iCloud calendar.
- Automatic sync will also work for manually created or personal events.
- To change your calendar export format, kindly refer to the Calendar Export -> Report/Flight Output Format section.
- If you want to hide or include a specific event for the export, kindly refer Calendar Export -> Filter Calendar section.

Friends & Family
- We have also improved the app experience for Friends & Family account users.
- Now your family members and friends can easily view your Schedule and Statistics.
- They can also start a conversation from the Chats section in the app.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Fixed a crash in Calendar Export
- Updated Facebook SDK for enhanced privacy changes in iOS 14

This version 3.1.1 includes the following improvements:
Privacy
- Now you can check our updated privacy terms, request your account data, or delete an account from Privacy Settings.

Apple Watch
- We've FIxed crash issue on the Apple Watch app. Syncing between RosterBuster and Apple Watch app has been improved too.

ICS Roster Upload
- We have enabled ICS roster upload directly from the Crew Portal screen within the RosterBuster app. Also, if you have an ICS roster link, you can directly paste it to the ICS upload screen.

Other Bug Fixes
- Improvement on Statistics Map screen where the map was not in alignment with the flight locations.
- Minor fixes for SIA, and BEL airlines.

This version 3.1.2 includes the following improvements:
Privacy
- Now you can check our updated privacy terms, request your account data, or delete an account from Privacy Settings.

Apple Watch
- We've fixed the crash issue on the Apple Watch app. Syncing between RosterBuster and Apple Watch app has been improved too.

ICS Roster Upload
- We have enabled ICS roster upload directly from the Crew Portal screen within the RosterBuster app. Also, if you have an ICS roster link, you can directly paste it to the ICS upload screen.

Other Bug Fixes
- Improvement on Statistics Map screen where the map was not in alignment with the flight locations.
- Minor fixes for SIA, and BEL airlines.
- Various bug fixes
Bug fixes and improvements.

In this version, we have made the following changes. 

- iPad app new side-by-side 3 panel layout.
Made major improvements in the iPad version of the app. Now you can easily view and navigate to different screens more easily. 

- Crew Portal Download
Added validation for manual roster download process. Now the app can check if the page from where you're uploading the roster is correct. 

- New User Instructions
Enhanced the experience of the first-time roster download process for the new user. 

- Bug Fixes
Various bug fixes and improvements.
